sentences.english: Short hair is gaining in popularity although men are supporting a variety of hairstyles.
sentences.chinese: 儘管男人們是不同髮式的擁躉，短髮卻越來越受歡迎。

sentences.english: The girl aped the way the movie star fixed her hair.
sentences.chinese: 這女孩子模仿影星的髮式。

sentences.english: A short, spikey style is a short hairstyle that gives you a modern and edgy look.
sentences.chinese: 短而向四外張開的髮式讓你看起來更時尚和充滿活力。

sentences.english: My wire-rim glasses and semi-fashionable haircut?
sentences.chinese: 我的金絲框眼鏡和還算時尚的髮式？

sentences.english: This hairdresser designs this elegant and graceful hair-style.
sentences.chinese: 這種典雅大方的髮式出自這位理髮師之手。

sentences.english: I told a lie when I said I liked her haircut.
sentences.chinese: 我騙她說我喜歡她的髮式。

sentences.english: In addition, two people in addition to hair color and style outside the spirit is quite long.
sentences.chinese: 此外，兩人除了膚色和髮式之外長的頗爲神似。

sentences.english: The key is finding a style that you both like and that flatters your face.
sentences.chinese: 關鍵是找到一款你喜歡的並且和臉型相得益彰的髮式。

sentences.english: Going to lay on that first conk?
sentences.chinese: 準備第一次整成直髮式？

sentences.english: I'd like to restyle my hair. Could you show me some pictures of hair styles?
sentences.chinese: 我想做一個新發型。你能給我一些髮式的圖片好嗎？

sentences.english: Have you seen Sharon's hair-do recently?
sentences.chinese: 你看到過莎倫最近做得的髮式嗎？

sentences.english: The latest side braids are another amazing christmas hair trend.
sentences.chinese: 最新的側邊麻花辮又是聖誕節的一大流行髮式。

sentences.english: This style of hair-do is brought in from abroad.
sentences.chinese: 這種髮式是從國外傳入的。

sentences.english: A dog wears a bouffant to a competition in Luoyang, China.
sentences.chinese: 河南洛陽的一隻狗狗設計了一款蓬鬆髮式來參加比賽。

definition: Guangdong embroidery, one of the four major traditional styles of Chinese embroidery (the other three being 蘇繡|苏绣[Su1 xiu4], 湘繡|湘绣[Xiang1 xiu4] and 蜀繡|蜀绣[Shu3 xiu4])
variant of 圖像|图像[tu2 xiang4]
Gandhara Kingdom in northwest India, c. 600 BC-11 AD, on Kabul River in Vale of Peshawar
